translation: Soon he becomes righteous and attains eternal peace; O Arjuna, proclaim thou for certain that My devotee never perishes.
commentary: 9.31 Quickly soon? becomes (he) becomes? Righteous righteous? Shasvat eternal? peace peace? Nigachchati attains to? Kaunteya O son of Kunti? Pratijanihi proclaim for certain? Not not? May My? Bhakta: Bhakta? perishes.Commentary Listen? is this the truth? O Arjuna may you proclaim that My devotee who has sincere devotion to Me? who has offered his inner soul to Me never perishes.
